sqlMap.select: select a.r_reviewno, a.roomres_no, a.r_content, a.r_star, a.r_pic, a.r_date, d.member_nickname, c.room_code from room_review a, roomres b , room c, member d where b.room_code = c.room_code and a.roomres_no = b.roomres_no and b.member_id = d.member_id and c.room_code=#room_code# order by a.r_date desc
select * from room_review where member_id=#member_id# and roomres_no = #roomres_no#
sqlMap.update: update room_review set r_content = #r_content# where r_reviewno = #r_reviewno#
